snippet: James (Whitey) Bulger did not explain his decision, but in remarks to the judge, he complained that he had been barred from putting forth his full defense.
abstract: Boston mobster James (Whitey) Bulger says he will not testify at his trial, which he calls a 'sham,' prompting a cry of 'coward' in the courtroom from the widow of a man he is accused of killing; his decision also deflates hopes of many who had yearned to hear him tell his story in his own words.
lead_paragraph: James (Whitey) Bulger did not explain his decision, but in remarks to the judge, he complained that he had been barred from putting forth his full defense.

headline.main: Bulger Declines to Testify, but Gets Something Off His Mind: ‘This Is a Sham’
headline.print_headline: Bulger Declines to Testify, but Gets Something Off His Mind: ‘This Is a Sham’
